{{Quote|House Clegane was built upon dead children. I saw them lay Prince Aegon and Princess Rhaenys before the [[Iron Throne]].|[[Thoros|Thoros of Myr]]|And Now His Watch is Ended}}
'''Aegon Targaryen''', the son of Prince [[Rhaegar Targaryen]], is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is deceased when the events of the series begin and is not expected to appear in the series.
sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', Aegon is the infant son of Prince Rhaegar Targaryen and Elia Martell and died in the Sack of King's Landing.
